rules: UNO is a card game for 2 to 10 players.
Players take turns playing cards that match the color or number of the previous card.
There are special cards, such as color change and reverse direction cards.
If a player has only one card left, they must say "UNO!" or draw 2 penalty cards.
The goal is to be the first player to run out of cards.
The game continues until a player wins by playing all their cards.
